channel.title: Shop Trading
channel.description: I have a problem!!! I can get my shop keepers to show up and walk around, but when i right click them they wont trade or talk to me! Any ideas on how to resolve this problem :confused: :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2008, 08:10:42 PM[/size][hr]Please help me once i know how to do this i can start setting up my towns :(
